text: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas is a 1982 American musical comedy movie starring Burt Reynolds, Jim Nabors, and Dolly Parton. It is based on a Broadway musical written by Peter Masterson. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1982 musical movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about prostitution Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
